page.title: 16A LARGE SUPERMARKET
page.content: "Fine Fare"is a large supermarket sit- uated on the main road to Longside.In November 1985 it will have been open for four years so it is still quite new. Since it first opened more people have moved into the area thus bringing more custom to the shop.It is a large store with seven departments each with a separate manager or manageress.They also employ another hundred and fifty people,eight of whom are on the Y.T.S. Their customers come from all over the place .Many of them use the free bus service provided which goes all round Peterhead,Fraserburgh,Cruden Bay, Turriff and the rest of Banff and Buchan.On average eight thousand customers visit the store for their weekly shopping-not surprising because it sells everything from clothes to food.
